summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas City Council will hold a Budget Workshop on August 13, 2024, at 9:00 AM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. This meeting aims to discuss the City Manager's recommended budget for fiscal years 2024-25 and 2025-26, providing an opportunity for council members to review and deliberate on budgetary priorities.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The primary focus of the meeting will be the presentation of the City Managerâ€™s recommended budget. This includes discussions on financial allocations for various city services and programs for the upcoming fiscal years.

**Important Details**:  
The budget presentation will outline significant proposals, including potential changes in funding for public safety, infrastructure, and community services. The workshop will also address any anticipated budgetary challenges and opportunities for economic development within the city.

**Action Items**:  
Council members will be expected to provide feedback on the proposed budget and may express preliminary preferences or take preliminary votes on specific budget items. The meeting will also allow for public input, where citizens can voice their opinions regarding budget priorities. 

The session will be accessible both in-person and via videoconference, ensuring community engagement and transparency in the budgeting process.
